price: 9. (Malaggii) baa yidhi: Sidaas (bay ahaan). Rabbigaa wuxuu leeyahay5: Waa ii fududdahay. Waayo, waxaan ku abuuray kolkii horeba adigoon waxba ahayn.
arabic: قَالَ كَذَٰلِكَ قَالَ رَبُّكَ هُوَ عَلَيَّ هَيِّنٞ وَقَدۡ خَلَقۡتُكَ مِن قَبۡلُ وَلَمۡ تَكُ شَيۡـٔٗا
footnotes: 5. Alle Subxaanahu watacaalaa uu u soo faray malaa’igta.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: qāla kadhālika qāla rabbuka huwa ʿalayya hayyinun waqad khalaqtuka min qablu walam taku shayan
